Testimony 0
Testimony: I believe that the culprit in this case could only have been Kanis.
Person: Laguarde

Testimony: I have no idea what transpired between Kanis and the victim.
Person: Laguarde

cot: The testimony from Laguarde claims that Kanis stabbed the victim to death using a chisel hidden in the chessboard (Testimony 4). However, the "Autopsy Report" (Evidence 20) would likely detail the cause of death, which may not align with being stabbed by a chisel.

Testimony 0
Testimony: I wouldn't go so far as to call it an interrogation.
Person: Laguarde
Testimony 1
Testimony: Around 3 AM the day before the show, the victim was brought into my office.
Person: Laguarde

Testimony: I always make sure to talk to all the new arrivals.
Person: Laguarde
Testimony 3
Testimony: Mr. Knightley... Yes, we had a little chat.
Person: Laguarde
Testimony 4
Testimony: After our talk, he went right back to his cell, I assure you.
Person: Laguarde

Testimony: Kanis was the one I hated. And he had no connection with the victim.
Person: Laguarde
